Description:
Responsibilities:Provide Calendar management for COO
Act as a liaison and provide support to the Board of Trustees
Coordinate with all Executive Team meetings and assist with staff meetings and events
Serve as a primary point of contact for internal and external parties on all matters pertaining to COOSkills
Skills:
Bachelor degree in relevant field
Min 5 year experience in similar field
To be able to work under pressure
Excellent computer skills
Ability to complete a high volume of tasks and projects with little or no guidance.
